import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { MenuItem } from 'src/app/configurations/navigation-meniu/menu-item'; import { Menus } from 'src/app/configurations/navigation-meniu/navigation-menus'; @Component({ selector: 'app-stacked-navigation', templateUrl: './stacked-navigation.component.html', styleUrls: ['./stacked-navigation.component.scss'] }) export class StackedNavigationComponent { public menu: MenuItem[] = []; public constructor() { this.menu = Menus.administratorMenuItems; } }
